City Council
------------

City Council - the elected government consists of the Mayor and five City Aldermen.Â  All are elected for two-year terms and are volunteer positions.
All meetings are open to the public.
City Council meetings are conducted on the 4th Monday of each month.
Notices for all city meetings are posted online, at City Hall, 7660 Woodway, Suite 460 and at the posting board outside Memorial Drive Elementary School, 11202 Smithdale, pursuant to the Local Government Code, Section 551.
